sent.orig: Thus, slimming drugs, diet diet, massage diet and exercise and so on, it has emerged another.
sent.trans: 于是，药物减肥、食疗减肥、按摩减肥以及运动减肥等等，也就纷纷应运而生了。

sent.orig: Objective To investigate the diet condition of aviation pilots and adjust the diet structure properly.
sent.trans: 目的了解飞行人员膳食情况，以便合理调整饮食结构。

sent.orig: A balanced diet is a healthy diet.
sent.trans: （营养）均衡的饮食是有利于健康的饮食。

sent.orig: Lipid energy percentage of high fat diet and standard diet was 35% and 11 %, respectively.
sent.trans: 高脂饲料和普通饲料中脂肪的热量比分别为35%和11%。

sent.orig: The study was based on diet data from Great Britain's National Diet and Nutrition Survey.
sent.trans: 本项研究数据源于英国国内饮食营养调查的相关数据。
